title: Exercise for the lazy
description: What's the least amount of exercise you should do to stay healthy?

vocabItems.definition: a promise that you make to yourself to improve your lifestyle by starting to do something good for you (or stop doing something bad) in the coming year
push yourselfincrease the amount of effort you put into whatever activity you are doing; try harder
a situation where you accept the disadvantages of something in order to get the benefits it brings
involving little exercise or physical activity
a task that is both easy to accomplish and brings positive results
a better result for the same amount of effort you put into something
